alert.note: Alert for Grant (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 12:28PM CDT until April 17 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Grant County in central Arkansas... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1228 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Leola, or 14 miles southwest of Sheridan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sheridan... Leola... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Thiel... Dogwood... Ain... Cross Roads in Grant County... Brush Creek... Slabtown... Millerville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
